title: Trying to transfer my other account from the Japanese server to NA, but I can't buy RP.
body:
I recently moved back to the US, but I can't transfer my account, because I can't purchase RP.  I can buy it on the NA site with this account, and I've used it here as well.  The card is a Visa that I got in Japan.

I've tried to send support tickets to Riot Japan, but NOBODY responds to my issues on the Japan server.  I can't buy prepaid cards here, even, as I can't redeem NA ones on the Japanese client.  

I'm assuming it's an issue that I'm physically in the US, but trying to use the store on the Japan-only client.  Still, it's getting frustrating. What can I do?

EDIT: Additionally, I've tried using a proxy, with no luck.

replies.body:
This is a particularly sticky situation you're left in. I recommend reaching out to our NA player support team [with a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let them know of the specific context as to why you're having issues getting RP to transfer your account. I'm confident they'll be able to come up with a solution and get this sorted out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Sent a ticket in, thanks for your quick response.  Thanks for you guys at Riot NA being so helpful about game issues.  (Riot JAPAN has a red post on the help forum about once a month.)
